resources.string: Your screen is being obscured by another app. Please close any overlays and try again.
Rooted devices/emulators are not supported for this application.
Rooted devices or emulators can pose significant security risks.
Active VPN connection detected, which may pose potential security risks.
Active Proxy connection detected, which may pose potential security risks.
An unsecured network connection has been detected.
Please enable automatic date and time settings for security.
Developer options are enabled on this device, which may pose security risks
Mock location is enabled, which may affect the accuracy of location data.
USB debugging is enabled, which may pose security risks.
Application spoofing has been detected, which may compromise security.
Accessibility Service is enabled for this app.
Accessibility Service is not enabled for this app.
Screen sharing is active, which may pose a security risk.
Screen mirroring is active, which may pose a security risk.
Screen recording is active, which may pose a security risk.
